sentence__0: Most selected birds are small in size.
sentence__1: The selected birds tend to have a swallow-like shape.
sentence__2: The belly pattern of the selected birds is usually white with black spotting.
sentence__3: Selected birds typically have a light brown primary color.
sentence__4: There is a black and orange stripe on the crown of many of the selected birds.
sentence__5: Other birds sometimes have multi-colored wings.
